item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 把握 "特朗普交易 "时机，关注美国共和党党纲
item.description:
与特朗普 2.0 的前景相比，美联储和降息对投资者决策的影响更大。自 2016 年以来，市场已经发生了变化。【原文：

The Fed and rate cuts have more impact on investor decisions than the prospect of Trump 2.0. And markets have changed since 2016.

】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老金基金向私人信贷基金投入 2.7 亿澳元
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金之一 Rest 向 Metrics Credit Partners 的房地产私人信贷基金投资了 4 亿澳元（2.7 亿美元）。【原文：Rest, one of Australia’s largest pension funds, has invested A$400 million ($270 million) in Metrics Credit Partners’ real estate private credit fund.】

item.title: 您现在需要了解的加密货币术语
item.description: 无论你是钻石手还是普通人，这里都有值得了解的行话指南。【原文：Here’s your guide to the jargon that's actually worth knowing, whether you've got diamond hands or are just a normie.】

item.title: 中国制造业增速连续三个季度超过经济增速
item.description: 中国制造业增速连续第三个季度超过整体经济增速，凸显了工业和出口对世界第二大经济体增长的推动作用。【原文：China’s manufacturing sector grew faster than the overall economy for a third quarter in a row, underscoring how industry and exports are driving growth in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 香港业主为填补空置写字楼支付更高的中介费
item.description: 随着开发商努力填补这个亚洲金融中心的空置商业空间，香港的亿万富翁业主正在向中介支付更高的佣金，以招揽写字楼租户。【原文：Hong Kong’s billionaire landlords are paying agents larger commissions for bringing in office tenants as developers struggle to fill empty commercial space in the Asian financial hub.】

item.title: 中国人民银行在缴税和关注利率之际大幅注资
item.description: 中国央行通过日常操作向银行系统注入了自一月份以来最多的现金，以便在纳税额增加和国家领导人开会制定经济议程之际保持充裕的流动性。【原文：China’s central bank injected the most amount of cash to its banking system since January via its daily operations, to keep liquidity plentiful as tax payments mount and the country’s leaders meet to set the economic agenda.】

item.title: 沃达丰 Idea 可能迎来更多好消息
印度 L&T 公司评级提升，有望赢得更多全球订单
item.description: 印度最大的工程和建筑公司拉森-土布罗有限公司（Larsen & Toubro Ltd.）在获得高于主权国家的全球信用评级后，预计其国际业务将得到提振，而国内市场则会放缓。【原文：India’s largest engineering and construction company Larsen & Toubro Ltd. expects its international business to get a boost while domestic market slows, after receiving global credit ratings higher than the sovereign’s.】

item.title: 瑞银称美国征收 60% 关税将使中国增长率减半
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的最新研究显示，对所有中国输美产品征收 60% 的新关税将使中国的年增长率减半以上，这凸显了如果前总统唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫，中国政府将面临的风险。【原文：New tariffs of 60% on all Chinese exports to the US would more than halve China’s annual growth rate, according to new research from UBS Group AG, underscoring the risks for Beijing if former President Donald Trump returns to the White House.】

item.title: 印度韦丹塔公司通过配股募集 6 亿美元资金
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社获得的交易条款，印度矿业公司韦丹塔有限公司（Vedanta Ltd. ）将向机构投资者发售最多 1.14 亿股股票。【原文：Indian mining company Vedanta Ltd. is offering up to 114 million shares to institutional investors, according to terms of the deal obtained by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 铜市最大鲸鱼引发重大转变猜想
item.description: 几个月来，随着铜价飙升到创纪录的水平，然后再次回落，一个关键问题在整个金属行业悄然出现：中国的国家电网运营商在搞什么鬼？【原文：For months, as copper spiked to record levels and then fell back down again, one key question has bubbled up across the metals industry: What is China’s state grid operator up to?】

item.title: 普拉博沃吓跑债券投资者，财务总监风险增大
item.description: 印尼震荡的债券市场的命运很可能取决于当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）选择谁担任其财政部长。【原文：The fate of Indonesia’s jittery bond market may well hinge on who President-elect Prabowo Subianto chooses as his finance minister.】

item.title: 香港授权银行发行多种货币的绿色债券
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，香港已规定银行销售三种货币的绿色钞票。【原文：Hong Kong has mandated banks to sell green notes in three currencies, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 绝对能源公司寻求合作伙伴；评级因欺诈调查被下调
item.description: 陷入困境的泰国可再生能源公司 Energy Absolute Pcl 表示，在其信用评级因欺诈调查被下调至垃圾级后，该公司正在寻求合作伙伴，帮助其偿还 2024 年到期的 195 亿泰铢（5.39 亿美元）债务。【原文：Energy Absolute Pcl, the embattled Thai renewables firm, said it’s seeking a partner to help it with 19.5 billion baht ($539 million) of debt due in 2024, after its credit rating was cut to junk due to a fraud probe.】

item.title: 中国铜冶炼厂为重要废金属短缺做准备
item.description: 由于中国政府为创造公平竞争环境所做的努力产生了意想不到的减少供应的效果，中国的铜冶炼厂正在为潜在的废金属短缺做准备。【原文：Chinese copper smelters are bracing for a potential shortage of scrap metal as Beijing’s efforts to create a level playing field have the unintended effect of reducing supply.】

item.title: 银行家在马来西亚追逐更多并购交易，交易量增长近一倍
item.description: 在亚太地区交易艰难的一年里，马来西亚被证明是一个亮点。【原文：In a tough year for dealmaking in the Asia-Pacific, Malaysia is proving to be a bright spot.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好特朗普任命万斯为竞选搭档苹果公司在印度的销售额创下新高高盛经济学家认为美联储放松政策的条件已经成熟。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Trump taps Vance as running mate. Apple’s India sales hit a record. Goldman economists see ripe conditions for Fed easing. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 交易商关注美元和中国下一步走势，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 在平静的夏季交易中，油价在连续两天下跌后企稳，美元前景和货币政策成为关注焦点。【原文：Oil steadied after a two-day decline in quiet summer trading, with the outlook for the US dollar and monetary policy in focus.】

item.title: 亚洲开盘谨慎；特朗普提振美股：市场综述
item.description: 美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在未遂暗杀事件后数日选择了竞选伙伴，华尔街因对特朗普连任的乐观情绪而受到提振。亚洲股市开盘后走势较为平淡。【原文：Wall Street was buoyed by optimism surrounding a second Donald Trump term as the former US President chose his running mate days after surviving an assassination attempt. Asian stocks were set for a more muted open.】

item.title: 两只专注于沙特股票的 ETF 在上海和深圳上市
item.description: 随着沙特阿拉伯与中国关系的加强，两只专注于沙特阿拉伯股票的交易所交易基金今天在上海和深圳首次亮相，这将为中国投资者提供押注这个石油资源丰富国家股票的选择。【原文：Two exchange-traded funds focused on Saudi Arabian stocks debuting today in Shanghai and Shenzhen will give Chinese investors an option to bet on equities in the oil rich nation as both countries strengthen ties.】

item.title: 在债务纠纷中，Invesco 要求罗伯特肖支付超过 1 亿美元的赔偿金
item.description: Invesco Ltd.周一要求罗伯特肖公司再支付 1 亿多美元，这是该公司与破产的家电零部件制造商正在进行的法庭诉讼的一部分，称该公司应被迫为帮助剥夺资产管理公司在罗伯特肖公司重组中的高级职位而付出代价。【原文：Invesco Ltd. demanded over $100 million more from Robertshaw on Monday as part of its ongoing court battle against the bankrupt appliance parts maker, saying the company should be forced to pay for helping strip the asset manager of its senior position in Robertshaw’s reorganization.】

item.title: 尽管中国需求疲软，力拓铁矿石出货量仍有所增长
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）称，第二季度其在西澳大利亚运营的铁矿石发货量同比增长 2%。【原文：Rio Tinto Group said second-quarter shipments of iron ore from its operations in Western Australia rose 2% from a year earlier.】

item.title: KKR 考虑以 30 亿美元出售机械制造商 Kito Crosby
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.公司正在考虑包括出售在内的Kito Crosby公司的各种选择，并正在与一家顾问公司合作，对这家机械制造商进行拍卖。【原文：KKR & Co. is considering options for Kito Crosby including a sale and is working with an adviser to run an auction process for the machinery maker, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易启动债券押注，下一步需要美联储提振
item.description: 政治因素为债券交易商最受困的赌注之一注入了新的活力，但只有美联储才能为其注入真正的动力。【原文：Politics has helped breathe new life into one of bond traders’ most beleaguered bets, but only the Federal Reserve can give it a real turbo boost.】

item.title: 计票已达 79%，卢旺达总统卡加梅早早取得领先优势
item.description: 卢旺达总统保罗-卡加梅（Paul Kagame）在周一的选举中取得了领先优势，大多数选票已经计算在内。【原文：Rwandan President Paul Kagame took a commanding early lead in Monday’s elections with majority of the votes counted.】

item.title: 新西兰通胀报告可能为新西兰央行降息铺平道路
item.description: 新西兰第二季度通胀放缓的程度可能超过央行的预期，这为央行考虑降息铺平了道路。【原文：New Zealand inflation may have slowed more than the central bank expects in the second quarter, paving the way for it to contemplate interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 贝莱德招聘政府联络员，得克萨斯州力挺 ESG
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. is bolstering its government-relations staff with a new hire in Austin as the money manager fends off criticism from Texas Republicans.】

item.title: 韦斯顾问寻求对 3000 万美元奖金支付进行外部审查
item.description: 负责关闭 Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers LLC 的顾问们希望对近 3,000 万美元的员工奖金进行独立审查，这些奖金与对冲基金的主要债权人杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group）存在法律纠纷。【原文：Advisers tasked with shutting-down Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers LLC want an independent review of nearly $30 million in employee bonuses that are subject to a legal dispute with the hedge fund’s primary creditor, Jefferies Financial Group.】

item.title: 高盛领导的集团通过 NEA 工具支持 Databricks 和 Plaid
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s alternatives unit is leading a consortium investing in a $540 million continuation vehicle created by venture capital firm NEA, according to people familiar with the matter.】
